Sample Alert at Hospital Entrance
Sample Alert at Hospital Entrance
page.title:
If you have fever and/or respiratory symptoms…… Cover your nose and mouth with a mask Report your symptoms to the receptionist

mouth with a mask

page.title:
Strategies for Patient Placement
Strategies for Patient Placement
page.enlisting:
